channel.title: Looking for server hoster
channel.description:
Hey, i have just somewhat completed editing my server and im looking for a hoster. They can have free admins. I preferably need someone who can leave the server on for a long time as i cannot as my pc is only 54mbps wireless adapter :s. As long as i get admin and you do not edit then its ok. Also dont claim it your own as i worked hard.
24/7 would be GREAT but im not really bothered about dedicated cause you have to pay. this server is for fun but its not much good if noone is on it long enough
Anyone interested post here. You MUST not be an amateur i.e. someone who doesn't know how to pf....
Also tell me how long you can host per day and at what times.

item.title: Looking for server hoster
item.dc:creator: @yazoomafroo yazoomafroo
item.description:
@yazoomafroo wrote:

added but you have not been on[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 12, 2008, 11:48:51 PM[/size][hr]anybody else?

btw when i update server i will have to resend and you need to copy characters over.
if you dont know how to do this dont even ask! :mad:

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for server hoster
item.dc:creator: @p_k_p_k p k p k
item.description:
@p_k_p_k wrote:

i’ll host it, i know how to pf but i don’t need to, i don’t have wireless, i can have it up neerly 24/7 if you want

add me on msn, b3n-kn0ck-2k7@hotmail.co.uk

Always here to help!

Read full topic
